programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Lampor : Keranda Terbang
programme.desc: Edwin dan Netta bersama dua anak mereka, Agam dan Sekar, kembali ke kampung Netta diTemanggung. Kampung yang telah ditinggal Netta 25 tahun bersama ibunya yang marah akan perbuatan sesat ayahnya. Netta harus menyampaikan pesan terakhir almarhumah untuk ayahnya. Netta disambut curiga dan dianggap pembawa musibah karena kampungnya sedang dilanda teror Lampor, setan pencabut nyawa yang membawa keranda terbang.

programme.title: You Saka.. Pergi Jauh Jauh Ep1
programme.desc: Episod Pertama cereka komedi seram disusuli dengan kepercayaan khurafat ini berkisar kepada personaliti Nia. Nia sebagai setiausaha syarikat milik seorang Datin Salina yang amat menyukainya hingga bercadang untuk dijodohkan kepada anak lelakinya. Ibu Nia dikampung, sedang sakit dijagai oleh Roslan, bapa saudaranya (Pak Lang). Nia mempercayai dia wajar menyeru puteri yang sesekali Nia akan lakukan bertujuan melindunginya dan juga sebagai amalan turun temurunnya selama ini. Jika tidak dilakukan, saka berbentuk syaitan akan menggangguinya. Ada sebab-sebab bahawa ibunya memiliki saka dan kematiannya bererti saka itu cuba mempengaruhi warisnya iaitu Nia. Nia tinggal dengan Shasa dan sepupu Shasa iaitu, Adrus adalah 'boy friend' Nia. Adrus sedang menceburi kerjaya dalam bidang paranormal, merupakan anak Ibrahim seorang bomoh. Ketika ibu Nia meninggal dunia dia belum ketahui. Sementara itu, semasa pengembumian ibunya berlaku juga kekecuhan iaitu muncul lembaga putih (berbentuk manusia - wanita). Selain dari itu, sesekali saka Gelam berbentuk syaitan (hitam jalur hijau) mengganggui Nia, 'boy friend'nya dan pernah bersama lembaga putih mengganggui bomoh Ibrahim.

programme.title: Phobia 2
programme.desc: Phobia 2 terdiri daripada lima segmen filem pendek yang diarahkan oleh lima pengarah terbaik filem seram Thailand. Seorang remaja yang melakukan jenayah pergi ke tempat suci untuk bermeditasi dan bersembunyi yang membawanya ketakutan dan rasa bersalah tentang apa yang dia lakukan (segmen Novis). Seorang lelaki muda dihantui di hospital oleh seorang lelaki tua yang koma yang tidak jauh darinya (segmen Wad). Dua lelaki bersama dua orang penunggang dalam trak mengalami masalah besar selepas membuka bahagian belakang (segmen Backpackers). Seorang peniaga kereta terpakai menyedari perkara yang dialami oleh pemilik/penumpang kereta terdahulu (segmen Salvage). Seorang pelakon yang tidak bekerja keras yang berperanan sebagai hantu dilaporkan meninggal dunia selepas dia dibawa ke hospital (segmen In the End).

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep5
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan bodyguard kepada Dato' Amir memujuk Mak Jah untuk kembali kepada bekas suaminya. Ryan akan dibayar RM 50 ribu sekiranya berjaya memujuk Mak Jah tetapi ditolak kerana Mak Jah terlalu marahkan kepada Dato' Amir. Dalam kes berasingan, Adam masih tidak mahu memberi buku senarai Ahli Kobra kepada bodyguardnya Farish selagi belum pasti keselamatannya. Zack dari Kumpulan Kobra menyamar sebagai rakan sekolah Adam, Datin Maya bersetuju supaya Adam meneruskan pengajiannya bersama Zack. Di rumah datuknya, Adam mulai minat belajar silat kerana terpikat dengan Hanis. Eliza tidak percaya dengan Rashid. Danial, bodyguardnya diminta menyiasat pergerakan Rashid dan Amran. Rohani akhirnya mengaku dia diupah Amran untuk mengaku sebagai kekasih Rashid. Rahul pula sebagai bodyguard Maya membenarkan Mikhail dan isterinya Zulaikha berjumpa dengan Boboy tetapi perlu dirahsiakan. Maya masih berkeras tidak membenarkan Mikhail berjumpa dengan anaknya. Semua maklumat di atas telah dilaporkan kepada ketuanya Nasha secara harian, Ryan cuba memikat Nasha.

programme.title: Mother Gamer
programme.desc: Untuk menghalang anak lelaki kesayangannya yang menyertai kejohanan E-sukan, dia memutuskan untuk menubuhkan pasukannya sendiri untuk mengalahkannya dan menghapuskan impiannya untuk menjadi pemain permainan profesional.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Kisah benar novel laris yang berkisarkan tentang sebuah keluarga yang membeli rumah hantu, dan mendapat kegerunan daripada roh penghuni rumah tersebut tanpa henti. Setelah sekian lama, mereka mengetahui bahawa rumah itu dibina di atas kubur purba. Mereka terpaksa menghabiskan setiap hari dalam ketakutan kerana mereka tiada pilihan. Isteri dan anak-anak terpaksa meninggalkan suami bersendirian di dalam rumah kerana tidak tahan dengan ketakutan yang melanda setiap malam. Bagaimanakah akhirnya, mereka akan dapat melarikan diri dari keganasan dan gangguan roh-roh rumah hantu, dengan pengakhiran yang begitu menakutkan?

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep4
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Maya mengambil perkhidmatan bodyguard bernama Rahul untuk menjaga keselamatan dan anaknya Aiman dari gangguan bekas suami bernama Mikhail. Ika isteri Mikhail akan diberi harta kekayaan bapanya sekiranya mereka mempunyai anak. Ika selalu mendesak Mikhail mendapatkan anak kandungnya dari Maya. Mereka bercadang menggunakan mahkamah untuk mendapatkan Aiman. Farish pula sebagai bodyguard kepada Adam anak kepada Dato Nora, Adam telah terlibat dengan Kumpulan Kobra yang melakukan jenayah. Oleh itu Farish terpaksa menyertai kumpulan penjahat tersebut untuk menjaga Adam. Ryan sebagai bodyguard kepada Eliza, dia menjaga keselamatan Eliza dari diculik oleh penjahat. Eliza di bawa oleh Rashid berjumpa dengan ibunya yang sakit. Elisa memberi RM 80 ribu untuk perbelanjaan pembedahannya. Ryan yang menjadi bodyguard Datin Maziah isteri kepada Dato Jailani mendapat maklumat Datin Maziah mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan Badrul. Perkara ini dimaklumkan kepada Dato Zailani. Mereka sebagai bodyguard memberi maklumat harian kepada Nasha sebagai ketua jabatan. Ryan secara sembunyi masih berterusan memberi bunga kepada Nasha

programme.title: KL Vampires
programme.desc: Dua kumpulan pontianak, kedua-duanya keturunan Raja Bersiong, tidak lagi memakan darah manusia. Mereka sebaliknya menggantikannya dengan darah sintetik.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep6
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan berjaya memujuk Nasha dan Mak Jah bergambar. Gambar ini ditunjukkan kepada Dato' Amir. Ryan dibayar ganjaran RM50 ribu kerana berjaya mengesan Mak Jah. Mereka juga menyewa rumah lain untuk Mak Jah. Dalam kes berasingan, Farish sebagai bodyguard bersama Adam meneruskan latihan persilatan dengan datuknya. Perhubungan Adam dengan Hanis semakin mesra. Danial sebagai bodyguard Eliza telah mendapat rahsia Rashid dan Amran. Mereka pernah bersamasama melakukan penculikan ke atas Eliza. Dengan sebab itu Eliza mengambil keputusan tidak lagi mahu berhubung dengan Rashid, Amran pula telah diberhentikan kerja. Rahul sebagai bodyguard Maya memberi amaran kepada Mikhail supaya tidak lagi berjumpa dengan Boboy tetapi Boboy masih berkeras mahu berjumpa dengan ayahnya Mikhail. Diakhir episod, Eliza diculik oleh Amran semasa Rahul bodyguardnya keluar mengambil barang yang tertinggal dari dalam kereta

programme.title: The Bodyguard 2
programme.desc: Ejen terbaik Vieng, negara berhampiran sempadan Thailand menerima misi penting bahawa dia perlu menangkap dua peniaga bersenjata yang boleh membahayakan negaranya.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penyelidik paranormal yang dikenali sebagai 'Puaka X" berputus asa dengan kewujudan makhluk rohani seperti itu, sehingga mereka menemui balai polis yang ditinggalkan di Gombak.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Kisah seorang graduan universiti bekerja sebagai budak pejabat yang pada suatu hari didatangi oleh seekor monyet cerdik tersesat ke rumahnya. Suatu hari berlaku krisis di pejabatnya. Budak pejabat itu perlu segera mencari jalan untuk menyelesaikan masalah dan dalam proses itu hampir membahayakan nyawanya sendiri. Dengan bantuan monyet tersebut, dia berjaya mengatasi banyak masalah dan berjaya menyelamatkan pekerjaannya.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. Mereka bertemu dan merancang sesuatu yang malangnya hanya telah menimbulkan kekacauan dan kekeliruan orang sekeliling.

programme.title: Sahabat
programme.desc: Kisah tiga sahabat yang bertemu ketika di penjara ingin memulakan hidup mereka kembali bersama- sama setelah keluar dari penjara. Pelbagai dugaan dan cabaran yang perlu ditempuhi mereka sebelum akhirnya berjaya mencapai apa yang mereka hajati.

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Malik menembak dua orang pembelot setelah diarah oleh Chief. Malik dan Amir, anak Datuk Ali di mana keduanya rakan lama bertemu semula di sebuah kelab malam. Persengketaan berlaku antara Chief dan Malik apabila dia dilihat sebagai pembelot yang telah mencuri wang kumpulan Chief.

programme.title: Orang Kampung Otak Kimia
programme.desc: Dipandang rendah oleh keluarga dan masyarakat kerana gagal dalam peperiksaan, Os mula mencipta satu formula. Os yang bijak dalam kimia dan biologi, mencipta formula yang membolehkan haiwan dan orang bisu boleh berkata-kata. Penemuan tersebut mula menarik minat seorang ahli perniagaan - namun malangnya dia ditipu.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Kisah seorang graduan universiti bekerja sebagai budak pejabat yang pada suatu hari didatangi oleh seekor monyet cerdik tersesat ke rumahnya. Suatu hari berlaku krisis di pejabatnya. Budak pejabat itu perlu segera mencari jalan untuk menyelesaikan masalah dan dalam proses itu hampir membahayakan nyawanya sendiri. Dengan bantuan monyet tersebut, dia berjaya mengatasi banyak masalah dan berjaya menyelamatkan pekerjaannya.

programme.title: Boss
programme.desc: Tiga gadis bersama seorang kapten membanteras kumpulan jahat yang melanggar undang-undang. Mereka berhadapan dengan Malik yang menjalankan kegiatan pemerdagangan manusia. Pelbagai rintangan perlu mereka tempuhi apabila salah seorang anggota mereka, Clara diculik kumpulan tersebut ketika cuba menyelamatkan tahanan lain. Mereka pun memulakan misi untuk mencari Clara dan menjatuhkan kumpulan Malik.

programme.title: Keluarga 99
programme.desc: Azam, peguam penceraian yang tidak mahu berkahwin kerana fobia selepas mengendalikan banyak kes permasalahan rumahtangga. Dijodohkan oleh kakak angkatnya bersama seorang gadis kampung bernama Marlia. Azam akhirnya bersetuju dengan rancangan itu namun timbul masalah apabila Maria cuba digoda oleh sepupunya sendiri.

programme.title: Mr.Os
programme.desc: Os, seorang pemuda biasa yang tidak mempunyai banyak harta mendapat durian runtuh apabila datuknya mewarisi wang berjumlah RM500,000 kepadanya. Dia perlu menghabiskan wang tersebut dalam masa 21 hari - sekiranya gagal, harta warisan tersebut akan diberi kepada sebuah syarikat. Syaratnya Os tidak boleh membeli aset atau tanah untuk simpanan sendiri. Meski sudah berbelanja boros baki wang masih tersisa.

programme.title: Janda Meletup
programme.desc: Rosnah, seorang janda muda cuba dipikat oleh Kamil yang tertarik dengannya namun gagal. Samad yang berasal dari Kuala Lumpur pergi ke kampung untuk mencari pembantu rumah dan bertemu Rosnah yang ingin bekerja dengannya. Kamil yang kecewa pergi ke Kuala Lumpur untuk berjumpa Rosnah selain tekadnya yang ingin bekerja dan mengahwini Rosnah. Suatu insiden terjadi menyebabkan Rosnah dan Kamil berganding bahu untuk menyelamatkan Samad.

programme.title: Awang Spanar
programme.desc: Awang Spanar, gelaran yang diberi kerana kemahirannya yang pandai membaiki bot melalui pelbagai liku kehidupan bersama rakannya, Salleh. Percutian mereka di Kuala Lumpur bertukar menjadi sebuah pengembaraan apabila terlibat sebagai saksi kes penculikan. Sekumpulan mafia menculik anak hartawan bernama Rahim. Menjadi buruan mafia, mereka meminta bantuan seorang detektif, Lydia.

programme.title: Juara
programme.desc: Empat beradik membawa haluan masing-masing selepas bapa mereka dimasukkan ke sebuah hospital sakit jiwa. Malik memilih untuk menjadi peninju manakala Sidi memilih jalan gelap dan diperalatkan sindiket pencurian berlian. Malik memenangi pertandingan tinju anjuran Joe Martino. Adiknya, Sidi dipaksa untuk bertarung dengan Malik jika tidak mahu kehilangan keluarganya.

programme.title: Cikgu Romantik
programme.desc: Bercita-cita ingin menjadi selebriti terkenal, Azizah mendapat surat uji bakat yang bertempat di Kuala Lumpur. Dia pun pergi dan menetap di rumah temannya, Tila lalu berkenalan bersama seorang guru vokal iaitu Ramli. Muncul pula Shahrul yang mengatakan bahawa raut wajah Azizah seiras dengan isterinya yang telah meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Keluarga 99
programme.desc: Azam, peguam penceraian yang tidak mahu berkahwin kerana fobia selepas mengendalikan banyak kes permasalahan rumahtangga. programme.title: My Stupid Boss
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep182
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep209
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kembang Boleh Layu Hatimu Jangan
programme.desc: Dudun tiba-tiba berminat dengan semua perkara yang berkaitan dengan bunga untuk memenangi hati seseorang yang disukainya.

programme.title: Aura Ep8
programme.desc: Aura adalah seorang gadis yang cantik dan baik, berasal dari keluarga yang kaya. Suatu hari, Aura diajak oleh ibu bapanya untuk pergi ke luar bandar bagi merasmikan sebuah rumah anak yatim. Sewaktu dalam perjalanan, seorang lelaki bersayap muncul dan memeluk Aura serta melindunginya daripada sesuatu yang berlaku. Kemudian, Aura seakan terbangun dari mimpi buruk tetapi apabila Aura membuka matanya, dia mendapati dirinya berada di tempat yang tidak dikenali, dan pemuda itu telah lenyap.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep53
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Kang Odong-Odong Bagi Cintanya Dong
programme.desc: Maya hampir diculik, tetapi diselamatkan oleh seorang pemain odong-odong yang tampan. Mak saudaranya mencari Maya, namun dia sedang dihibur oleh penolongnya yang dianggap sebagai penculik.

programme.title: Aura Ep10
programme.desc: Aura adalah seorang gadis yang cantik dan baik, berasal dari keluarga yang kaya. programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ep10
programme.desc: Helo para guru dan murid-murid sekolah rendah di seluruh Indonesia! Uji pengetahuan dan ketangkasan dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat dalam Juara Indonesia.

programme.title: LIDA 2021 Ep16
programme.desc: LIDA 2021 ialah rancangan hiburan Dangdut terbesar dan no 1 di Indonesia. LIDA 2021 merupakan musim keempat Liga Dangdut Indonesia dan pemenang musim ini juga dijangka menjadi generasi dangdut Indonesia seterusnya.

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: The Gangster, The Cop, The Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: Miss Baek
programme.desc: A woman finds it difficult to shake off her ex-convict label, until she meets a girl whom she is determined to save.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover theyve switched bodies.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's 2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was 2B...

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: A newly widowed insurance examiner takes a case involving a woman who is in a coma. When visits her at the hospital, he encounters her spirit and realizes he is the only person who can see her.

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: Welcome To The Guesthouse
programme.desc: A university student who keeps failing at securing a job stumbles upon a guesthouse by the beach. With no other options, he begs for a job there and discovers surfing.

programme.title: My Worst Neighbor
programme.desc: In a house with little soundproofing, a man and a woman living next door started a noise war. They then cohabitate through the wall, and catching up in subtle emotions...

programme.title: The Girl On A Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: Classical Pieces As My Guide Ep9

programme.title: An Exciting Offer Season 4 Ep10
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep9
programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Lets share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep5
programme.desc: Total 6 young people, Yvonne Ching, Cary Wong, Ruan Yu, Sabrina Mendes, Oscar Tao and Randal Tsang, formed as two groups to visit various little shops by showing the better way of doing business. They want to focus closely on the theme of people's livelihood and various little shops in Shanghai.

programme.title: Cheer Up! Little Shops Ep6
programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would share life for 105 days because of various reasons. The observation group includes G.E.M., Li Dan, Chen Jian Bin, Wei Da Xun, Zeng Ke Ni, and Yang Li.

programme.title: Share Life Ep20
programme.desc: The cultural show invited Shan Jixiang, Yun Zhou, Yan Xiao, Niu Junfeng as "youth troupe" to present new wonders, new landmarks, new sights and the diversity of world heritages and civilization from multiple perspectives and to undercover the story of the World Heritage sites behind.

programme.title: The Shape Of Culture Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: A documentary cultural program focuses on intangible cultural heritage. Yang Lan, the Chinese media proprietor & journalist, brings us to visit the inheritors of 11 intangible cultural heritage skills with cultural successors, discovers the essence of Chinese excellent traditional culture.

programme.title: All Reviving Ep1
programme.desc: Intangible Cultural Heritage refers to the behavior or performance which is important for cultural inheritance in a certain district, such as folk custom, culture, beliefs, traditions, etc. As the theme of this program, the results of protection of intangible cultural heritage could be demonstrated and promoted comprehensively.

programme.title: The Inheritors Season 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The vibrant implementation of Chinese-style modernization is presented from various perspectives, utilizing vivid grassroots stories, tangible and sensory details, as well as comprehensive sets of real and objective data, with Chinese-style modernization serving as the central narrative context.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep471
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep2223
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep23
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep878879
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep695
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3396
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47374738
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep219220
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1860
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep969
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel 84, Charing Cross Road. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following The Way We Are, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu-hsin (Pai Piao) of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman (Wang Jung) to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker (Ku Feng). When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh (Derek Yee) vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tians rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tians granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lous brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.desc: Tamil Romantic Comedy film, Starring - Satyaraj, Meena, Goundamani, Anand Raj, Jayasitra & Manoramma

programme.desc: Tamil psychological action thriller film, Starring - Ravi Teja, Jayaram, Sushanth, Anu Emmanuel, Faria Abdullah, Megha Akash & Daksha Nagarkar

programme.title: Saajan Ki Saheli
programme.desc: Kunti abandons her baby in order to lead a lavish life and marries a rich man. Years later, she realises that her husband is indulging in an affair and is shocked to find out the truth about the girl.

programme.title: Welcome
programme.desc: Two thugs meet Rajiv, who belongs to a respectable family, and want to fix their sister's wedding with him. However, when Rajiv's uncle refuses to the match, a series of hilarious situations occur.

programme.title: Boss
programme.desc: After his father disowns him, a businessman raises Surya like his own son. Years later, Surya transforms himself into Boss and fights for the rights of the deprived sections of society.

programme.title: Auzaar

programme.title: Global Baba

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.

programme.title: Nayee Padosan

programme.title: Trikon Ka Chauta Kon

programme.title: Gumrah
programme.desc: Seeing Roshni's talent for singing, Rahul gives her a break and they eventually fall in love. On a foreign trip, she is arrested for possession of cocaine, not knowing that it is all Rahul's doing.

programme.title: Ansoo Ban Gaye Phool
programme.desc: When honest Vidyanand is sent to prison by a Seth who bears a grudge against him, he has only one thing on his mind - to avenge his humiliation, and he will go to any extent to achieve this.

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.

programme.title: Jai Kishen
programme.desc: Jai, a man who is visually impaired, discovers that he has a twin brother, Kishen, who was separated from him on the day his father was murdered. Thus, begins his quest for revenge with his sibling.

programme.title: Duniya
programme.desc: Mohan, an honest worker, is framed and arrested for his employer's murder. After his jail term, he sets out to exact revenge and bring the real culprits to justice.

programme.title: Fauladi Policewala

programme.title: I Am 24

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1 Ep1039
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A group of mutated turtles rises from the darkness to save New York City from the hands of an evil kingpin.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane

programme.title: What You Don't Know About Me
programme.desc: Ikendu, a Malian immigrant, falls in love with Patricia in an Italian-speaking town of Switzerland. When he is falsely accused of drug dealing by corrupt policemen, the couples relationship is put to the test as they discover each others secrets.

programme.title: Acasa, My Home
programme.desc: For 20 years, the Enache family has been living in the Bucharest Delta in harmony with nature. When the nine children and their parents are evicted from their home, they are forced to adapt to life in the big city.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: The Girl With Nine Wigs
programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: To Live To Sing
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusufs best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusufs calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: What You Don't Know About Me
programme.desc: Ikendu, a Malian immigrant, falls in love with Patricia in an Italian-speaking town of Switzerland. When he is falsely accused of drug dealing by corrupt policemen, the couples relationship is put to the test as they discover each others secrets.

programme.title: Love and Mazel Tov
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Anne, the attractive Jewish bookstore owner, Daniel pretended to be Jewish. As the lie gets out of hand, he can only hope she will continue to love him when the truth is inevitably revealed.

programme.title: Midnight Runner
programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: Acasa, My Home
programme.desc: For 20 years, the Enache family has been living in the Bucharest Delta in harmony with nature. When the nine children and their parents are evicted from their home, they are forced to adapt to life in the big city.

programme.title: The Sound Of Trees
programme.desc: 17-year-old Jrmie dreams of a life away from his familys sawmill and forestry work. He much prefers pimping his car, hip hop and slacking off with friends - much to his fathers despair. When his brother leaves town, their lives change drastically.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Mezas decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: The Sunny Side Up Story
programme.desc: After years of her husband disliking her sunny side eggs, a woman finally seeks out someone to find out her special recipe. Aside from the recipe, secrets are revealed, and feelings are laid bare.

programme.title: Found S1 5
programme.desc: Public relations specialist Gabi Mosley and her crisis management team now make sure there is always someone looking out for the forgotten missing people.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 8
programme.desc: Thony enlists Armans help to get to Mexico for Lucas transplant, but plans go dangerously off course and Thony has to call upon the doctor and gangsta in herself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 12
programme.desc: Penny's old boyfriend, Zack, and his wife want a baby, but when Zack is infertile, they ask Leonard to help.Meanwhile, Raj attempts to mend things with his ex-fiance Anu.

programme.title: Friends S9 22

They all get harsh reviews from celebrities like Danny Bonaduce and Leif Garrett, plus hot comics like Mike Trainor.

programme.desc: Pacific - Crossing the Pacific, Gordon discovers how a view from above is helping protect hammerhead sharks and giant tortoises, and what it could reveal about the future of our coral reefs.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fair Isle - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode he returns to Fair Isle, an island in Shetland in northern Scotland, where Tommy Hindman lives.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Ice Cream - Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman look at Britain's history with ice cream, and see it produced on an epic scale.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ultimate Predators - In the final episode, Steve looks back at his top Deadly Predators from the series and meets the ultimate predator. He reviews the biggest and best stunts from the series and reveals how the team bought a giant air vortex cannon to the Deadly junkyard to demonstrate the predatory prowess of the sperm whale.

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wicked Weapons - When it comes to weapons, snakes have some of the best on earth. Steve goes in search of the adder, and sets out to blow our minds by showing us the fastest snake on earth: the diamond rattlesnake.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong in Sri Lanka S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The presenter heads for the paradise isle of the Indian Ocean, discovering its golden sands and historic culture, visiting the fortress town of Galle, a mask making factory and an elephant sanctuary.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Last Breath - Unable to breathe, Cyril is trapped underwater while on a mission to catch huge flat-headed beasts hiding in the murky snake and alligator-infested rivers of Texas and Mississippi. The only way to get to the 70lb flatheads is to go 30 feet deep, and catch them with his bare hands.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep5
programme.desc: Into the Night - Sue Aikens must protect Kavik from the dangers that lurk in the shadows. The Hailstones use the cover of night to search for food under the ice.

The only way to get to the 70lb flatheads is to go 30 feet deep, and catch them with his bare hands.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Tortilla chips - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest tortilla factory in Europe, while Cherry Healey takes on the hottest chilli in the world and Ruth Goodman reveals how the Elizabethans treated their ruff collars.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough presents Planet Earth III, the third instalment of the landmark award-winning series. Starting with our coasts and the abundance of life the exists where our seas meet the shore.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Montana - Glacier National Park - With its pristine forests, alpine meadows and rugged mountains, Glacier National Park in Montana is a world like no other. Ryan Pyle dons his snow-boots and embarks on an epic trek across this snowy and isolated landscape with its formidable peaks.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Socorro - Steve Backshall is in Mexico exploring the Eastern Pacific and the Ravillagigedo Archipelago to find ways to protect the local shark population.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Bone Cold - The Hailstones brave the freeze to seek new land for the expanding family. Sue Aikens must replenish her resources in Chena to survive the brutal cold.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. Hes not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Cold-Blooded Killers - From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, its just another day at the butchers counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Garden Route - In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Echoes of the Past - Learn how Arctic terns negotiate a 50,000-mile-a-year commute to summer in Kerrys Maharee Islands. Go whale-watching off Brandon Head, then witness Irelands greatest wildlife spectacle: a 1,000-strong colony of grey seals on Great Blasket Island.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Masters of Defence - Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep2

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Water Warriors - From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Crossing the Danakil - The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Kruger's Pafuri - In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. Its a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cradle of Mankind - Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: How the Wild Things Sleep - There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fall on the Tundra - Nunavik, meaning Great Land, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Child of Fire - For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Gates of Hell - Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies Falls - Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lemur Spirit - This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision its how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision its how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail - The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, its easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the underwater movie capital of the world. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Child of Fire - For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies Falls - Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lemur Spirit - This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fall on the Tundra - Nunavik, meaning Great Land, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.desc: Graham Norton returns for a landmark 31st series of his Bafta-winning talk show, with his sofa once again packed with A-list celebrities. Focusing on the latest trends, stories and aspects of celebrity culture, Graham's quick-witted comedy continues to captivate audiences around the globe. There's just enough risqu material to make the famous faces on Graham's sofa, as well as the viewers at home, cringe with delight before the best music acts from around the world round off each episode with a stunning live performance.
