programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep26
programme.desc: Big Fun Town / New Crackridge - Archibald and Bea plan another couple's long overdue honeymoon. Is a tornado coming to Crackridge? Archibald sure seems to think so.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep26
programme.desc: King Juli-End - King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep39
programme.desc: A Butter Tomorrow / Days Of Future Present - A butter spill threatens the Harvey Lake ecosystem. Audrey, Dot and Lotta are determined to throw Richie the best birthday party ever.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep39
programme.desc: Groundhog Stay/Gone Guys Gone - Skidmark and White Shadow try to stop spring from coming by keeping a groundhog in his hole; Smoove loses the power behind his effortless cool.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep26
programme.desc: Big Fun Town / New Crackridge - Archibald and Bea plan another couple's long overdue honeymoon. Is a tornado coming to Crackridge? Archibald sure seems to think so.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep31
programme.desc: Battle of the Babies / Norman - Rocksys rapport with Lindsay and Brehts now feral baby inspires her friends to get their own babies, and then make them fight. / Twig and Leaf reunite with their brother Norman and compete to win his affection. But the intentions of Norman, along with a fourth hidden brother named Shanks, are malicious.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep49
programme.desc: Small Change - When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep71
programme.desc: Mi Amore Wing - Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep72
programme.desc: Ruff Transition - A baby Razorwhip bonds with Ruffnut forcing her to become a Wingmaiden but when she doesnt have the maternal instincts she must figure out how to protect the baby dragon when the Flyers attack

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep31
programme.desc: Battle of the Babies / Norman - Rocksys rapport with Lindsay and Brehts now feral baby inspires her friends to get their own babies, and then make them fight. / Twig and Leaf reunite with their brother Norman and compete to win his affection. But the intentions of Norman, along with a fourth hidden brother named Shanks, are malicious.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep49
programme.desc: Small Change - When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep37
programme.desc: Rupert and the Invisible Foxes - The Fox Twins trick Raggety into turning them invisible with a magical glowing leaf so they can steal Rupert's picnic. When they're discovered Ping Pong tries to reverse the magic but inadvertently makes herself invisible too. Raggety is the only one who can help them but he's lost his magic leaf. Will Rupert and friends be able to find it before its glow finally vanishes and the Foxes and Ping Pong are forced to stay invisible for ever?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep38
programme.desc: Rupert and the Dew Fairy - Rupert and friends are asleep in a tent in Rupert's garden. Rupert wakes up very early to hear sounds outside. He finds Daisy the Dew Fairy, busy scattering dew in preparation for the arrival of the Dawn Chorus. She is very nervous as it's her first day doing the whole of Nutwood and she hopes to earn her golden wings that morning. But then she realises she has lost her dew bucket. Rupert offers to help her find it. Meanwhile, an early-rising Raggety comes across the strange shiny bucket and can't resist investigating. By the time Rupert and Daisy find him he has emptied all the dew out. Daisy is frantic if she doesn't get Nutwood ready in time for the Dawn Chorus she will not earn her golden wings. Rupert persuades Raggety to do elf magic to replace the missing dew and the two of them help Daisy make up for lost time, spreading dew throughout the garden. But what is this Dawn Chorus Daisy talks of? They are in for a wonderful musical surprise when their work is complete.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep39
programme.desc: Rupert and the Apple River - Rupert and friends are going apple picking by the river. It's a hot day, so Ping Pong offers to magic up some fizzy apple drink for them all to drink afterwards. But her spell goes very wrong, sending giant apples rolling down into the river. Just as Rupert is suggesting Ping Pong try again they are all amazed to see Ming float by, surrounded by apply-bubbles. Ping Pong's giant magic apples have turned the river into a fizzy apple juice river, and the bubbles make you float. Soon Rupert and friends are having a great time, sucking in bubbles and floating about. But then Edward notices a problem. The apples are causing a log jam at the bridge and unless they can get them out, the river will flood. How will they get the river back to normal and prevent Nutwood being swept away.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep40
programme.desc: Rupert to the Rescue! - Freddy and Freda borrow Ping Pong's Magic Book and accidentally say a spell that makes their toy cupboard float off across Nutwood. Rupert takes charge of trying to stop the runaway item of furniture before it does any damage, trying to lasso it. But the Fox Twins meddle again, and Ping Pong gets tangled up in the lasso, ends up floating high in the sky, dangling from the flying cupboard! Things become even more serious when she floats out over the sea and gets stranded on a rock. Rupert has to make the Fox Twins face up to the trouble they've caused, and find a way to undo the magic.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep37
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders how can we hide to watch butterflies? That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep38
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx? Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep39
programme.desc: What Shall We Have For Our Harvest Breakfast? - It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, What shall we have for our harvest breakfast? That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. What about something chewy suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep40
programme.desc: What Hat Should Mimi Wear? - Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.title: Olivia Ep5
programme.desc: Olivia Takes A Road Trip - On the looooong drive to Grandma's house, Olivia finds ways to pass the time. She imagines her family traveling in style, as she pilots her very own jumbo jetOlivia Air! By the time they arrive at Grandma's, Olivia's had so much fun that the discomfort of the road trip has been forgotten.

programme.title: Olivia Ep6
programme.desc: Olivia Goes International - When asked to give a presentation for her class's International Day. Olivia can't decide which country to choose. Being Olivia she invents her own country Olivitania -where cupcakes are the national food and the national anthem sounds suspiciously like Puccini.

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secrethe's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.title: Olivia Ep8
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep37
programme.desc: Why Bees Sting - You see there was a time when Bees didn't sting. All the animals loved the Bees and they especially loved their sweet and yummy honey. The trouble was all the precious honey was disappearing and there was a honey crisis in Tinga Tinga. Something had to be done. Luckily clever old Tortoise has a cunning plan. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep38
programme.desc: Why Peacock Struts - You see there was a time when Peacock didn't strut. He was a very proud bird and he wanted to be the best at everything. He wanted to be the best bird-brain in Tinga Tinga. He wanted to be the best flyer in Tinga Tinga and he wanted to have the biggest and the best tail in Tinga Tinga. But as Lion so wisely points out Sometimes it's not good to get everything you want!' Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep39
programme.desc: Why Aardvark Has A Sticky Tongue - You see there was a time when Aardvark didn't have a sticky tongue. He had a long nose, big clumsy paws and he found it very difficult to eat. Then one day Aardvark's tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvark's tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvark's tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep40
programme.desc: Why Whale Spouts - You see there was a time when Whale didn't spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep28
programme.desc: Deus Ex Monkhuaha / Slak Attack - Sandy becomes jealous when the family gets an adorable monkhuahua/Eep and Thunk act like lazy slaks instead of doing their schoolwork and chores

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep14
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast and the Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, theyre invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep27
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem / Changing Lanes - When Archibald accidentally shrinks himself and Loy, they must work together and brave a challenging course through their giant house. / In an effort to make the bowling league championship more balanced, Arch and Brock switch teams (and families), spending a day in each others (bowling) shoes.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep27
programme.desc: O Captain, My Captain Part 1 - Prince Barty and Princess Julienne, King Julien's needy and dramatic parents, must take over for their son when he's held captive on a pirate ship

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep40
programme.desc: Get Rich or Cry Trying / Dingo Unchained - Future Richie regrets running away from Harvey Street and invents an app to alter the past. The gang goes camping in Australia.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep40
programme.desc: Party Poopers/The League - The FAST crew's vacation is threatened by hard-partying toilet frogs. The Crew quits racing when they become obsessed with a fantasy racing league.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep27
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem / Changing Lanes - When Archibald accidentally shrinks himself and Loy, they must work together and brave a challenging course through their giant house. / In an effort to make the bowling league championship more balanced, Arch and Brock switch teams (and families), spending a day in each others (bowling) shoes.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with glamping gear, the kids decide they prefer Guys plush method of camping to Branchs insistence on roughing it./Poppys the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep32
programme.desc: Party Twig / Space Blasters - Cicadas have hatched and due to a misunderstanding, they anoint Twig their Party God, leaving Rocksy, Berry, and Leaf in charge of keeping Twig alive. / The Mighty Ones have an adventure in space i.e. get stuck in patio lights.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep73
programme.desc: Triple Cross - Hiccup teams with an unexpected person in search for an antidote when Toothless is seemingly poisoned

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep74
programme.desc: Family Matters - The riders realize the Flyers are using the Deathsong to capture Singetails and plan a rescue mission to liberate them

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep41
programme.desc: Rupert and the Butterfly Collector - Rupert, Bill and Edward set off to look for butterflies in the wood. In particular they hope to see the rare Polka Dot Butterfly. On the way, they meet a Butterfly Collector who is also looking for the Polka Dot but - instead of just enjoying watching the butterfly - he wants to catch it in his net and keep it in a jar. The friends see it as their mission to protect the Polka Dot and let it fly free.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep42
programme.desc: Rupert and the Lost Stars - Rupert pedals his car to meet Bill and Ping Pong at the tree house where they plan to spend the night. On his way he meets Raggety who is very proud of the new lantern he has made from glowing bugs he found in the forest. Rupert invites him to sleep at the tree house but Raggety announces he is a big brave elf and wants to sleep by himself. At the tree house, Bill has a surprise for Rupert. Astra the Star Girl has come to Nutwood, but sadly she has not come to play. She dropped some new stars while she was hanging them in the sky. They have fallen down to Earth and she has followed them to Nutwood. She has to get them back in the sky before nightfall or they will miss their first moonlight and fade away forever. Ping Pong magics Rupert's car into a flying car to assist their search but there are lots of shiny things in Nutwood sending them on false trails. Evening approaches and time is running out. Meanwhile, Raggety prepares for his night alone, and discovers the glowing bugs in his lantern can talk.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep43
programme.desc: Rupert and the Photo Finish - RUPERT lends his TRIPOD to the TWINS to keep their camera steady. The TWINS surprise RAGGETY, who accidentally aims a spell at the CAMERA, which comes alive. Now they're playing camera tag! Except if you get flashed you end up stuck in a photo! After RAGGETY, PING PONG, MING, EDWARD and BILL are all trapped, RUPERT realises that if they all get zapped they won't be able to play again or even get out of the photos. But RUPERT has a plan. The TWINS act as bait so he can outsmart the CAMERA with its own reflection. The CAMERA takes a photo of itself, which releases everyone, and RAGGETY gets everything back to normal with a final spell.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep44
programme.desc: Rupert Lights the Way - When the Rocky Bay lighthouse stops working Rupert and friends try to help. But what can create enough light to warn the ships away from the rocks? When he sees Ming snapping at a firefly, Rupert gets an idea....

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep41
programme.desc: What's Happened To My Little Tree? - Jess shows us his little tree: a beautiful flowering shrub in full bloom. He tells us that his little tree didn't always look like this...there was a time when the tree's leaves turned yellow! What's happening to my little tree? That's the Big Question! Jess asks Mimi for help, but she's in bed with a bad cold. She's drinking lots of fluids to help make her better. Jess gives his little tree some more water to help make it better but when he goes to check on his tree the next day the leaves have turned brown and crinkly! Baa and Billie come along - Billie is tucked in the brim of Baa's woolly hat, it's too cold for her to come out. Jess wonders if his little tree is cold and needs warming up. So he wraps a potato sack round the little tree. But the next day things are even worse the leaves are falling off.! And it's happening all over Greendale Farm! Jess goes to see Horace who is busy composing a new song. It's all about the Seasons. Jess finally realises that what's happening to his tree is perfe

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep42
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Cool? - It's the day of Mimi's dance in Jess's barn but its too hot to move, let alone dance. Jess wonders how they can all keep cool! That's the BIG QUESTION. Jess asks his friends for ideas. Horace keeps cool by swimming under water, but that's no good for Jess and everyone else who can't swim. The puppies keep cool by panting, but that just makes Jess even hotter and out of breath. And Willow keeps cool by standing very still. That won't work for a dance, they can't all keep still! Mimi comes past holding a little fan which makes a lovely cool breeze. Jess realises that what they need is a giant fan that could make a cool breeze in the barn. He and Mimi make a huge fan which Horace works as part of his one-man band. Everyone has a great time dancing and keeping cool. Jess has answered the Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humsquatch - Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The PAW Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppas playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they cant see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. // When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals. // To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Jelly Juggernaut - Bossy and Turtle figure out how to share a card.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Reindeer's Game - Bossy and Turtle get distracted by a video game and lost Roller's backpack.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships / The Pirate Parade - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - When Bonnie Bones steals Enrique's ship, he begrudgingly works with the Pirate Protectors to get it back.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep503
programme.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure - Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Babysitting Heroes - Blaze and AJ are helping their friend Stripes look after some baby animals, when the little critters accidentally float away on big bubbles. Now, it's up to these three babysitters to find their adorable animal friends and save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Shark Strength - When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Switcheroo / Protect The Egg - Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Jelly Juggernaut - Bossy and Turtle figure out how to share a card.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Boss Bissy - Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humsquatch - Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The PAW Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppas friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zo. Zo has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zo has invited all of Peppa and Georges friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Crystal catastrophe / Good Steel bad Steel - Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt - What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep114
programme.desc: One Bear Show - Bossy tries to do his own play.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Short Kites - Bossy and Turtle want to fly a kite but Bossy's room must be clean first.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Jelly Juggernaut - Bossy and Turtle figure out how to share a card.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Lost & Flounder - Lorelai accidentally loses a magical Merlandian artifact and learns how to stay calm in order to recover it from Pepito.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that Gertrude is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chlo and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chlo have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep239
programme.desc: Nature Trail - Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Abra-Ka-Pickle! - Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Toy Trouble! - The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! Only Blaze and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep925
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep926
programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Best Fin-Ship Day - Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt - What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Attack Of The Drones / Slime Time - Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitn Calavera!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep114
programme.desc: One Bear Show - Bossy tries to do his own play.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Spectacular Skating Spectacular - Bossy wants to put on a skating show but he doesn't know how to skate..

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Gran-Gran Dreams of Japchae - Bossy and Turtle plan a special night for Gran-Gran but cant agree on planning.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Disc Fling - When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows just who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Three - LaaLaa has fun counting to three; 1, 2, 3 rabbits, 1, 2, 3 flowers and 1, 2, 3 trees! Laa-Laa even counts three Teletubbies; Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Worm - Dee encourages a friend to say worm and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Friendship Parade - Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Mayor Force One - Messy gets to fly Mayor Oki's plane, but he crash-lands it in a tree! Luckily, robots fly to the rescue.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Different Folks - Monty and Gran disagree over ice cream flavours, leaving him unsure if people who like different things can still be friends.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Ice Cream - Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each other's ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they don't notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Detective Badge - A freshly baked apple pie is swiped from Duggee's windowsill, so he dons his detective badge to track down the thief.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Submarine Badge - The dog and the squirrels go off on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine, spotting creatures including a giant sea stallion and some jazz fish.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep46
programme.desc: The Bubble Badge - The dog blows a lot of bubbles with his pot of bubble mixture. Though it is quite hard to do, most of the squirrels eventually get the hang of it and the clubhouse fills up with lots of bubbles.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Lake Retba, Senegal - The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegal's Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Waitomo Glowworm Caves, New Zealand - It's not a good day to be a glow-worm, when Grandmaster Glitch goes in search of some disco sparkles in New Zealand. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Road Trip - Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Handstand - At a party, Bingo is desperate to show off her handstand skills, while Nanna can't find a way to make herself useful. They're both feeling a bit lost, until they find each other.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Andy and the Naked Mole Rat - Andy jets off to the Sahara Desert, in Africa, in search of a naked mole rat.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Fast Machines - Grace drives a very expensive supercar, shows off the fantastic Concorde and rides a superbike around her track!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep24
programme.desc: Swashdance - Captain HeyHo thinks she can't dance but Cook and Line think they can help her to find her groove.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep45
programme.desc: The First Aid Badge - The squirrels are playing Copy the King when Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Luckily, Duggee has his First Aid badge, so he can bandage Tag up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Be Careful Badge - When Naughty Monkey starts throwing bananas down from his branch, Ethel slips and the squirrels investigate.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep43
programme.desc: The Big Parade Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help out when the leader of the Big Parade hurts his leg.

programme.desc: The Great Barrier Reef, Australia - The team dives into action as Glitch's treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.desc: Duck Hotel - Duck wins a trip for two to a rather exciting hotel, and he finds that he settles in much quicker than Sarah.

programme.desc: Decorating Donkey - Sarah plans a surprise for when her hibernating tortoise wakes up.

programme.desc: African economies in crisis - How are young Africans managing to stay afloat in today's economy? As the Covid-19 pandemic and Russia's war on Ukraine impacted job markets, global energy and food prices, we find out how this has impacted Africa's youths. We also meet the Mombasa local who paints intricate mandalas and Zanzibari musician, Siti Amina, who takes us around her city, Stone Town.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC278UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between welterweight champion Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and rival Leon Rocky Edwards. Plus, Luke Rockhold returned to action to face Paulo Costa. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep907MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: The first champion from Mexico, Brandon Moreno, continues his rivalry with former flyweight champion Deiveson Figueiredo as they meet for a third time for the 125-pound belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their battle at UFC 270.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC279DiazvsFerguson
programme.desc: UFC 279 was headlined by a bout between two UFC legends and Ultimate Fighter winners: Nate Diaz and Tony El Cucuy Ferguson. Plus, Khamzat Chimaev faced rival Kevin Holland. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep9
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep3
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month Incredible Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon. From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, youll see the UFCs biggest names in their most memorable performance.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2334
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 MotoGP Guru by Gryfyn Australian Motorcycle Grand Prix Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2334
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
